ygData.subject: Re: What is Kiting?
ygData.msgSnippet: kiting is guiding a mob around close behind you and outrunning them while still doing damage, druids and shaman can do this by Sowing themselves and casting
ygData.messageBody:
kiting is guiding a mob around close behind you and outrunning them while
still doing damage, druids and shaman can do this by Sowing themselves and
casting DoT spells on the mob, and bards can Selo and Bellow

-----Original Message-----
From: Mr. Beeba [mailto:flpmc@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 02, 1999 4:03 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] What is Kiting?


From: "Mr. Beeba" <flpmc@...>

One question...what is kiting and how is it done? I have seen this a lot in
this group, but I am sorry, I have never heard of it before.
